aka: Seoul Is Busy On The Phone
trans_title: Seoul Is Busy On The Phone
introduction: SYNOPSISByun Dae-mool is a country bumpkin who comes to Seoul with big dreams. But he becomes ensnarled with hoodlum Yook Dae-ju who sets him on his way from masseuse to male prostitute. Byun Dae-mul disguises himself as a blind masseuse and provides massages and sexual services to lonely married women. He doesn't like how his life has turned out but there seems to be no way out for him. Dae-mool notices Queen, the godmother of the underworld. Bewildered by her abilities, he lives with her but his honest nature begins to bother him. He falls in love with Eun-ji, an innocent girl, and dreams of starting over with her. But a battle to the finish is inevitable when Eun-ji is kidnapped by a human sex slave trade ring.故事一个农村的年轻人转向首尔梦想一个梦，但他在首尔站附近陷入一个女神的扭曲，晚上变成一个妓女，女按摩师，从女按摩师开始。这个流离失所者伪装成一个盲人，并面对一个孤独的，作为一个酒店按摩师，但在这个生活中发生冲突的已婚妇女，但已经做不到了。流入街头夜生活的东西就在黑社会的教母之眼里。她在权力的背景下与权力生活在一起，但她与原来的精神和基本特征相冲突。在幸福的生活中与恩慈会面，梦想与她真爱，但是当恩吉被商贩绑架时，她却失去了这一事实，并进行了一场血腥的战斗。
